item.title: We Won Division 1 and are promoted to Elite! - Samurai Paintball
item.description:
We Won Division 1 and are promoted to Elite! - Samurai Paintball

We Won Division 1 and are promoted to Elite! What a weekend..... Its been emotional! So proud of everyone for what we have achieved. Buzzing just doesn't cut it! After winning 4 games in Prelims and the Semi Final, we went out and won the Final.

item.title: An Interview with James Riley - Samurai Paintball
item.description:
An Interview with James Riley - Samurai Paintball

LSP: James, could you introduce yourself? "My name is James Riley, I play for London Samurai MV and am the Owner and Manager of London Samurai Paintball." "I was born in Germany in 1975, my father was a GI based in Frankfurt, this is how my parents met.
